Extra install instructions: 
- Extract it using latest winrar
- double click on the penumbra_bp_ger.exe
- Install it
- Then apply the crack to C:\Program Files (x86)\Paradox Interactive\Penumbra Black Plague\redist

For those who doesn't know how to make it work:
Install the shit, go into the folder "HATRED"
Copy the launch program and put the shit in the install directory.
That meaning; C:\Program Files (x86)\Paradox Interactive\Penumbra Black Plague\redist

If you have problems with the fucking lag or "funny" colors during gameplay, then right-click the launch icon, into "properties", you press compatibility and change the modus into "Windows 2000" or something else that's newer than that.

If this still doesn't work for ya, then buy the game or find another download.
P.s: Downloading the crack-fix might also fix the issue.
Regards

Trouble with "Funny Colors" in gamplay ? 
Video Settings > Shader Quality 

Change Shader quality to medium.

Works great..
